Text:
The Japanese influence on this Thai spoken film is palpable.

If only a Western film studios had the courage to make films with such realistic sex scenes as this.

Whilst not actually pornographic, it's pretty "near the knuckle" yet all done in context.

Pity there's no English sub-titles.

Thanks for the upload.

More like this, please.

Might even wake up Hollywood.
